summary: When a death row prisoner tells him he wouldn't have led a life of crime if only he had had one friend as a child, Father Edward Flanagan decides to start a home for young boys.
cast: Spencer Tracy|Mickey Rooney|Henry Hull|Leslie Fenton|Gene Reynolds|Edward Norris|Addison Richards|Minor Watson|Jonathan Hale|Bobs Watson|Martin Spellman|Mickey Rentschler|Frankie Thomas|Jimmy Butler|Sidney Miller|Robert Emmett Keane|Victor Kilian|Boys Town Acapella Choir|Arthur Aylesworth|King Baggot|Barbara Bedford|James Blaine|Stanley Blystone|Edwin Brian|Everett Brown|Orville Caldwell|Donald Chaffin|Bennie Chorre|Richard Clucas|Roger Converse|George Cooper|Nell Craig|Helen Dickson|Calvin Ellison|Wesley Giraud|Robert Gleckler|Donald Haines|John Hamilton|Murray Harris|Billy Hazard|Edward Hearn|Al Hill Jr.|Al Hill|George Humbert|Gladden James|Raymond Kelly|Don Latorre|Arthur Marks|Billy McCullough|Claire McDowell|Jackie Morrow|Paul Nichols|Ray Nichols|Tommy Noonan|Jay Novello|Ronald Paige|Henry Rackin|Charles Ramos|Kane Richmond|Kent Rogers|Nelson Scott|Jimmy Sommerville|Bobby Stone|Chuck Stubbs|A.W. Sweatt|Phillip Terry|Johnny Walsh|Frank Whitbeck|Sonny Boy Williams|Robert Winkler|William Worthington|John Wray|Walter Young
title: Forja de hombres
